entity.name: President Trump announces ‘hard hitting’ sanctions on Iran
entity.description: President Trump said he’s imposing sanctions on Iran’s supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, and his office, “in response to Iran’s increasingly provocative actions.” The announcement comes after Iran shot down a US Navy drone last week.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump What about #Iran then?! How's the situation in Iran?! #coronavirus @realDonaldTrump
